title: "Protons contain intrinsic charm quarks, machine-learning analysis suggests"
excerpt: "A 40-year-old debate about charm quarks in protons may have been settled by a new machine-learning analysis of data from the Large Hadron Collider (LHC) at CERN and other facilities. However, not all particle physics agree with this assessment."
